Name: Doc Yoshida
Content: Ninjo, I warned you before. It's too dangerous to go alone.

Name: Ninjo
Content: I have to get my revenge, even if I die.

Name: Ninjo
Content: Don't get into my way or I will cut you off.

Name: Doc Yoshida
Content: I know. I will stay standby and try to help you survive.

Name: Doc Yoshida
Content: I can't hack this elevator. Find another way!

Name: Doc Yoshida
Content: Finally, I got the security key! Your goal is near!
